languages.text: "Я была свидетельницей тому, как пленных под покровом тьмы доставляли к задним дверям, но что стало с ними потом — то мне неведомо. И не мое то дело, что сотворяют тебе подобные со своими сородичами..." {n}Ирлиэт прикасается к блестящему камню на груди, словно проверяет, на месте ли он.{/n}

"I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я была свидетельницей тому, как пленных под покровом тьмы доставляли к задним дверям, но что стало с ними потом — то мне неведомо. И не мое то дело, что сотворяют тебе подобные со своими сородичами..." {n}Ирлиэт прикасается к блестящему камню на груди, словно проверяет, на месте ли он.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

"I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

"I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

"I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

languages.text: “我见过囚犯在夜幕的掩护下被运到了后门，但他们落得怎样的下场，我就不知道了。我并不在意你们人类如何对待你们的同胞……”{n}伊莉耶特摸了摸胸前闪亮的宝石，似乎是在确认它还在那里。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我见过囚犯在夜幕的掩护下被运到了后门，但他们落得怎样的下场，我就不知道了。我并不在意你们人类如何对待你们的同胞……”{n}伊莉耶特摸了摸胸前闪亮的宝石，似乎是在确认它还在那里。{/n}

languages.text: «He visto a prisioneros transportados a las puertas traseras al abrigo de la noche, pero desconozco su destino. Y lo que los humanos hagan a los suyos no se encuentra entre mis preocupaciones...». {n}Yrliet toca una joya brillante sobre su pecho, como para comprobar que sigue ahí.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «He visto a prisioneros transportados a las puertas traseras al abrigo de la noche, pero desconozco su destino. Y lo que los humanos hagan a los suyos no se encuentra entre mis preocupaciones...». {n}Yrliet toca una joya brillante sobre su pecho, como para comprobar que sigue ahí.{/n}

languages.text: 「暗がりに覆われた裏口へ連れて行かれる囚人を目撃したが、何が起きたのかは分からない。それに、人間がその仲間に何をしようと我の知ったことではない…」{n}ユリエットはそこにあるのを確かめるかのように、胸でキラリと光る宝石に触れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「暗がりに覆われた裏口へ連れて行かれる囚人を目撃したが、何が起きたのかは分からない。それに、人間がその仲間に何をしようと我の知ったことではない…」{n}ユリエットはそこにあるのを確かめるかのように、胸でキラリと光る宝石に触れる。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe gesehen, wie Gefangene im Schutz der Dunkelheit zu den Hintertüren gebracht wurden, weiß aber nicht, was dann aus ihnen wurde. Und es ist auch nicht meine Angelegenheit, was Ihr Menschen mit Euresgleichen macht ..." {n}Yrliet berührt einen funkelnden Edelstein auf ihrer Brust, als wolle sie überprüfen, ob er noch da ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gesehen, wie Gefangene im Schutz der Dunkelheit zu den Hintertüren gebracht wurden, weiß aber nicht, was dann aus ihnen wurde. Und es ist auch nicht meine Angelegenheit, was Ihr Menschen mit Euresgleichen macht ..." {n}Yrliet berührt einen funkelnden Edelstein auf ihrer Brust, als wolle sie überprüfen, ob er noch da ist.{/n}

languages.text: « J'ai vu les mon-keigh amener des prisonniers aux portes de derrière sous couvert de la nuit, mais j'ignore ce qu'il est advenu d'eux et je ne me préoccupe pas de ce que vous faites à vos semblables... » {n}Yrliet touche une pierre étincelante sur sa poitrine, comme pour vérifier qu'elle est toujours là.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu les mon-keigh amener des prisonniers aux portes de derrière sous couvert de la nuit, mais j'ignore ce qu'il est advenu d'eux et je ne me préoccupe pas de ce que vous faites à vos semblables... » {n}Yrliet touche une pierre étincelante sur sa poitrine, comme pour vérifier qu'elle est toujours là.{/n}

languages.original_text: "I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

languages.text: "Mahkûmların gece karanlığında arka kapıdan sokulduğuna şahit oldum ancak onlara ne olduğu konusunda bir bilgim yok. Zaten siz insanların türdeşlerinize ne yaptığınız beni ilgilendirmez." {n}Yrliet, âdeta orada olup olmadığını kontrol eder gibi göğsündeki parlak bir taşa dokunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I witnessed prisoners being delivered to the rear doors under cover of darkness, but what became of them I know not. And it is not my concern what you humans do to your fellows..." {n}Yrliet touches a sparkling gem on her chest, as though checking it is there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mahkûmların gece karanlığında arka kapıdan sokulduğuna şahit oldum ancak onlara ne olduğu konusunda bir bilgim yok. Zaten siz insanların türdeşlerinize ne yaptığınız beni ilgilendirmez." {n}Yrliet, âdeta orada olup olmadığını kontrol eder gibi göğsündeki parlak bir taşa dokunuyor.{/n}
